fields.name: Drive-By Effects:
fields.value: - Roll a d6, if you roll a 2 or lower, you fall into the volcano, a separate board.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While in the volcano, you cannot be targeted by anything else outside of it.
- More info in the board image.
- When you **Drive-By** the exit, you teleport back to the bridge, the remaining movement is still used.
